hints.command: :h Welcome to the server! Please follow all rules and have fun.
:h Please drive realistically and follow traffic laws.
:h Staff are here to help - please be respectful.
:h Check the rules channel in Discord for full guidelines.
:h Report any issues to staff members immediately.

messages.command: :m You have been warned for FailRP. Please review the rules.
:m Please stop the unrealistic behavior immediately.
:m You are being monitored by staff. Follow all rules.
:m Contact staff if you need assistance with anything.
:m Your behavior is not acceptable. Final warning.
